author: Sharmishta Sarkar
title: Canon EOS R5 likely to launch April 20
description: While not quite explicitly saying what it's for, Canon has revealed the date of a major online announcement.
content:
Canon fans have a lot to look forward to in April, with the camera maker announcing a major live stream event to be held on April 20 at 1pm EDT (that would be 6pm on the same date in the UK and April 21 at 3am AEST in Australia).
There's no mention of what t… [+1216 chars]
